ya2.2.2:1.1_0: Yassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?

ya2.2.2:43.1_0: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ arūpaṁ upapajjantānaṁ ye ca arūpaṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati,

ya2.2.2:106.1_0: Pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:106.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:106.1_2: Pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:107.1_0: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:108.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:108.1_2: Itaresaṁ catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:109.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:110.1_0: Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:110.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:110.1_2: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:111.1_0: Yassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:112.1_0: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati,
ya2.2.2:112.1_1: no ca tesaṁ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:112.1_2: Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:113.1_0: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:114.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:114.1_1: no ca tesaṁ rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:114.1_2: Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:115.1_0: Yassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:116.1_0: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:118.1_0: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:119.1_0: Pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati,
ya2.2.2:119.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:119.1_2: Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:120.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:121.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:121.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:121.1_2: Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:122.1_0: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:123.1_0: Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati,
ya2.2.2:123.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:123.1_2: Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:124.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:125.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:125.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:125.1_2: Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:126.1_0: Yassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:127.1_2: Itaresaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:128.1_0: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.2:129.1_0: Yassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:130.1_2: Itaresaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:131.1_0: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.2:133.1_0: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:134.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha,
ya2.2.2:134.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:134.1_2: Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:135.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:136.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:136.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:136.1_2: Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:137.1_0: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:138.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:138.1_2: Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:139.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:140.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:140.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:140.1_2: Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:141.1_0: Yassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.2:142.1_0: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:143.1_0: Yassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.2:144.1_0: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:146.1_0: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:147.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha,
ya2.2.2:147.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:147.1_2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhittha,
ya2.2.2:148.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:149.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:149.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:149.1_2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:150.1_0: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:151.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha,
ya2.2.2:151.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:151.1_2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:152.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:153.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati,
ya2.2.2:153.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:153.1_2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhittha.
